title.narrative: Red Nose Day 2013 UK Aid Match - Women and Girls

description.narrative: The aim of the programme is to contribute to a transformation in the status and lives of women and girls in Africa so that they can realise their rights and their full potential, and become equal and respected members of families, communities and society. We want Comic Relief’s funding to address changes at both the practical and structural levels and to bring about positive and enduring changes for women and girls in Africa.;

activity-date.narrative: Start dates for individual projects within this activity are staggered.This is either the planned end date for the last project within the activity or the due date of the last report to DFID, whichever is the latest.
This is the activity's start date.

mailing-address.narrative: Comic Relief_x000D_ 89 Albert Embankment_x000D_ London _x000D_ SE1 7TP
